file_content.text: Gormak should die in battle. You send me to Voss-Ka, the heart of corruption. I will not go!
Do you think I am afraid to die? I am the Gormak king. I walk where Voss do not dare go.
I went to the Nightmare Lands. The darkness crawled inside my head, showed me the Voss.
I see Voss past, Voss future... the seeing is Voss corruption, a curse from the Dark Heart.
Both you and the Voss want your visions to stop.
You and the Voss agree.
All Voss corruption must be destroyed. I will die gladly to end it.
What's the Dark Heart?
The Dark Heart?
The ancient core of the Nightmare Lands. A dark, dangerous place few survive. Most go mad.
Being cursed didn't stop you from using your visions against the Voss.
I've got no sympathy.
The Voss spread this corruption to the Nightmare Lands. It is too late for me, but they will not corrupt the Gormak!
The darkness of the Nightmare Lands steals the reason of some Mystics. It could give Gormak a Mystic's sight.
How many more Gormak have entered? There could be others! Gormak Mystics!
Impossible. Jokull is not a Mystic. We will not listen.
Why is it so hard to accept a Gormak having visions?
Anything's possible.
The Gormak are beasts. Nothing more.
The Force gives the Mystics their power. Jokull could have it, too.
Visions aren't exclusive.
Your power does not make you a Mystic.
I thought you listened to anyone who had visions.
He's no different.
You cannot compare the Mystics to this... abomination!
Knows the future, has visions... sounds like a Mystic to me.
He's pretty close.
You speak blasphemy, outsider.
How would you explain Jokull's visions?
Got a better theory?
The Gormak lies to save himself.
You're in denial.
The commandos called as predicted. Jokull saw the future. This cannot be denied.
We are not interpreters. The Gormak's visions must be judged.
You would set a Gormak among the Voss? Show all that the Mystics share their power with our enemies?
No. Jokull would bring chaos to Voss-Ka. Finish him, outsider.
We have to know more about Jokull's visions, no matter the cost.
I'll risk it. [Spare Jokull.]
You are fortunate the Mystics have seen your worth.
Letting Jokull live isn't worth the consequences.
He must die. [Kill Jokull.]
You protect the Voss. You are a true ally.
The Three will decide our next move. Speak with Laryn-Ki in Voss-Ka.
I will inform Pevthak-Fra of our victory. Farewell.
Voss. You attacked our power generators and destroyed our cannon. You killed many Gormak to get here. You bring corruption.
You would destroy Voss-Ka. You are the corruption.
Save your Voss lies. You come to Gorma-Koss to destroy us. But I am greatest Gormak warrior. You will fail.
It's over, Jokull. Stand down and surrender.
You've already lost.
Only a Voss would think of surrender. Voss know they will die here.
We can negotiate. This doesn't have to come to violence.
I don't want to fight.
There can be no peace. Too many Voss. Too much corruption.
Gormak technology's no match for Republic training.
You're outmatched.
Gormak build great weapons, machines, a ship. Voss fight with words. Voss are weak.
I think you're counting your banthas before they're bred.
Don't be so sure.
Voss tell many lies about the Gormak. Voss are afraid to see the truth.
That's news to us.
I've killed plenty of great warriors. You're no different.
Get over yourself.
I know of you, Voss. You come from the stars. You perform foul Voss rituals. I will enjoy killing you.
We have fought the Voss for years. You have never come this far into Gorma-Koss. Did you think it was skill?
I have seen the future. I knew you would enter Gorma-Koss. I knew you would come here to kill me.
If you knew we were coming, you would have stopped us.
That's impossible.
Stupid Voss. You think you are here because you are great warriors? I know how to defeat you.
What do you mean?
I see what happens. I know your moves before you make them. I see Voss die before they fall.
Pretty easy to see something that's already happened.
You're bluffing.
Foolish Voss laughs, thinks I lie. You will not laugh when I tell you what I have seen.
You saved weak Voss from my Gormak warriors. They will get stuck behind Gormak defenses. Weak Voss will send a message to tell you.
Rade-Sa... the Gormak defenses are too many... we cannot reach you! We must fall back....
You destroyed my defenses, called more Voss to replace those you left to die. They will never get inside. You will hear their excuses now.
Rade-Sa... I sent reinforcements... they have met Gormak armies... they cannot reach you... repeat, they cannot--
The Gormak told us what would come. It happened as he saw.
Only a Mystic knows what comes. The Gormak sees!
You're some kind of Gormak Mystic.
He's having visions.
Voss think they know all. Voss think Gormak are blind.
There must be an explanation.
I saw where your weak Voss would go and what they would do. I saw how my warriors could stop them.
I've heard enough. [Attack.]
I have seen you too, Voss. I know how to kill you and all your weak warriors. You will die now.
Voss are foolish to come here. You will die.
